trends: There have been 105 other sightings in Tampa
There was one other sighting in Tampa on or around November 17th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsdriving from work towards home and obove the littel vilage there was that bright orange light, it was big and i drove towards it. i stopt the car in the vilage and looked at it for a minute or so, another person was tehre was well (unkown to me) I took my crappy handycam and shot one picture. But at this point it became already weaker, i stept into my car again and tried to follow it out of the village and stopped next to a field without light pollution but it was gone. the image does NOT shows the size and the brightness it had while seeing with the naked eye!!! sorry my english, it all happend just 30 min ago!
